Header: Police expand probe on Nuwara Eliya robbery
Content: A police investigation has begun to ascertain whether there is any involvement of the driver and cashier with this morning's (Jan. 02) robbery of Rs. 14.5 million in Nuwara Eliya. A police officer who is conducting the probe said police have a suspicion about their possible links. In this incident, Rs. 14.5 million were robbed while money was being delivered in a small lorry from a cigarette agency in Nuwara Eliya, to be deposited in a private bank. Three suspects who came in a three-wheeler had robbed the money after throwing chilli powder at the driver and cashier.
